alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:32PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverside, or 8 miles north of Tremonton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Accumulating hail is expected on Interstate 15 between Fielding and Plymouth. Locations impacted include... Tremonton, Cache, Lewiston, Clarkston, Trenton, Plymouth, Riverside, Peter, Richmond, Garland, Newton, Amalga, Fielding, Cornish and Collinston. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 381 and 395. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
